question: Dilip Chenoy was appointed as the Director General of __________.
explanation: Federation of Indian Chambers of Commerce and Industry (FICCI) appointed Dilip Chenoy as its Director General. Dilip Chenoy had held various positions including the managing director and CEO of National Skill Development Corporation (NSDC), director general of Society of Indian Automobile Manufactures (SIAM) and deputy director general of Confederation of Indian Industry (CII). Director General position of FICCI had been vacant since Arvind Prasad retired from the position two years back.
